content.question: In McDonald v. Chicago (2010), the United States Supreme Court held that the Constitution protects the right to keep and bear arms for the purpose of self-defense and that the Second Amendment applied to the states through which of the following constitutional clauses?

choices.label: The due process clause of the Fifth Amendment
The due process clause of the Fourteenth Amendment
The equal protection clause of the Fifth Amendment
The equal protection clause of the Fourteenth Amendment

content.answer: The due process clause of the Fourteenth Amendment
